metadata.title: CVE-2015-1334 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
attach.c in LXC 1.1.2 and earlier uses the proc filesystem in a container,which allows local container users to escape AppArmor or SELinuxconfinement by mounting a proc filesystem with a crafted (1) AppArmorprofile or (2) SELinux label.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1334` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblxc1 - 1.1.3-0ubuntu1
lua-lxc - 1.1.3-0ubuntu1
lxc - 1.1.3-0ubuntu1
lxc-templates - 1.1.3-0ubuntu1
lxc-tests - 1.1.3-0ubuntu1
python3-lxc - 1.1.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lxc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.3-0ubuntu1').
